transArray.content: Beijing Hotel, the room is small, the price is high, normal, the price was low during the epidemic, the epidemic is over, the price increase is normal, there is a printer at the front desk, it is convenient to get things, and it is free, like it üëç

Dear guest, thank you very much for your praise of our hotel. We will continue to work hard to live up to your praise. Thank you again for your affirmation of the hotel. We look forward to visiting you again. I wish you a pleasant journey.
